mapper.select: select t_no as tNo, s_no as sNo, m_no as mNo, t_status as tStatus, t_price as tPrice, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate from service_trade where m_no = #{_parameter} order by t_status, t_no

select s.s_no as sNo, s.m_id as mId, s.s_title as sTitle, s.s_price as sPrice, s.s_content as sContent, s.s_img as sImg from (select s_no from service_trade where m_no = #{_parameter} order by t_status , t_no) t left outer join (service) s on t.s_no=s.s_no

select p.p_date from (select * from service_trade t where m_no = #{_parameter} order by t_status , t_no) t left OUTER join (select * from service_pay where t_no in(select t_no from service_trade where m_no = #{_parameter})) p on p.t_no = t.t_no

select t_no as tNo, t.s_no as sNo, t.m_no as mNo, t_status as tStatus, t_price as tPrice, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, s.s_title as sTitle, m.m_id as mId from service_trade t,service s,member m where t.s_no=s.s_no and t.m_no=m.m_no and s.s_no=#{sNo} and m.m_no=#{mNo}
